title: [Poem] A Zoe Suprise
body:
A bubble I see
	Closing on me

Passing through all
	Leaving in sprawl

Thrown without care
	Leaves us ensnare

A star followed through
	In vision it grew

In the world it binds
	It is I it finds

One final strike
	Leaves my head on a spike
__________________________________________
I saw a poem below, and was inspired to create my own.
